name: Rock’n Shaolin: Legend of Seven Paladins 3D
name_original: Rock’n Shaolin: Legend of Seven Paladins 3D
description:
Rock’n Shaolin: Legend of Seven Paladins 3D is an action-shooter game developed by Accend. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Rock’n Shaolin: Legend of Seven Paladins 3D is available on PC.
